It has been lagging for the past 3 years. Because of it I stopped playing it and wrecking my nerves. All the fixes that I tried did not work (nvidia configs, audio drivers, file cheks, power options etc.). It looks that the game is just not optimized to run for particular pcs. And I'm talking about offline gameplay lag (it's not an internet problem).
I recomended this game to all gampayers but upgrade your skill and never use cheats it's beter for all players who want to anjoi the gameplay.
